title: Bug 132786: Value2 is not cleaned after converting operator from BETWEEN to EQUAL in highlight rule
description: When the highlight rule is set to 2 between 1 and 3, the color blue is applied. However, Value2 is not cleared after converting the operator from BETWEEN to EQUAL.
OB: Currently, when the operator is changed from BETWEEN to EQUAL in the highlight rule, Value2 is not being cleared or reset.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the operator is changed from BETWEEN to EQUAL in the highlight rule, Value2 should be automatically cleaned or reset.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Insert a data.
2. Set a highlight rule in the Property Editor and save the report.
3. Modify the highlight rule and change it to 1 equal 1 with the color blue.
4. Observe if Value2 is automatically cleaned or reset after changing the operator.
